results.AbsenceDescription: Any remaining entitlements from previous years will not be used until the vacation entitlement of the current year has been consumed completely.
Any remaining entitlements from previous years will not be used until the vacation entitlement of the current year has been consumed completely.

If you are sick up to 3 calendar days, a doctors sick note is not required*, but you need to maintain this leave request. In addition, please inform your team about your absence and the approximate duration. -------------------------- *Exception: Should you be taken ill during your vacation, according to � 9 of the German vacation law you must submit a doctor's sick note with effect from the first day that you are unable to work. Registering yourself as unable to work via the absence tool under "sickness w/o sick note" is not permitted.

If you are sick up to 3 calendar days, a doctors sick note is not required*, but you need to maintain this leave request. In addition, please inform your team about your absence and the approximate duration. -------------------------- *Exception: Should you be taken ill during your vacation, according to � 9 of the German vacation law you must submit a doctor's sick note with effect from the first day that you are unable to work. Registering yourself as unable to work via the absence tool under "sickness w/o sick note" is not permitted.
Time off in lieu if you work on a bank holiday either abroad or in a different state in Germany (Bundesland).
Time off in lieu if you work on a bank holiday either abroad or in a different state in Germany (Bundesland).

This leave type is to select, if you want to withdraw one or more complete working days. This leave type can be used for fixed weekdays  (e.g. decrease of level of employment down to 80%) or for a continuing  leave (e.g. one or more months). Concerning minimum and maximum volume of withdrawal please inform under Quicklink de-azk.

This leave type is to select, if you do not want to withdraw a complete working day but only one to some hours per day. Concerning minimum and maximum volume of withdrawal please inform under  Quicklink de-azk.
Time compensation for on call duty.
Time compensation for on call duty 1/2 day.
SAP may provide you with max 2 relocation days off for your move to the host country. Relocation Days have to be taken in the host country.

REQUIREMENTS FOR SHORT-TERM NURSING CARE LEAVE (PFLEGEAUSZEIT): 1. The care-dependent person must be a close relative in accordance with the legal regulations (Pflegezeitgesetz). 2. The care situation must be urgent, that means the care situation arises suddenly and unexpectedly. 3. DOCTOR'S CONFIRMATION to PERS04 (care dependency* and the necessity of the release from work) 4. DO NOT USE IN CASE OF SICKNESS OF CHILD *ATTENTION: If the official confirmation of a care level is not in place yet, then it must be very likely that the criteria for at least care level I will be fulfilled. The legal definition of care dependency is NOT the same as a general need of care, which can occur e.g. because of a broken leg etc.

You are eligible for special leaves in the following cases. Please choose the entitlement of days according to the event: 3 days: death of husband, wife or recorded partner; 2 days: own marriage. Death of own child; 1 day: birth of child. Death of own parents or parents in law. Move with own household (limited for one case per year) if employment is not terminated. Participation at marriage of own child.
Trust-Based Working Hours: Used for absences which will start at least 2 weeks after request date.
Trust-Based Working Hours at Short Notice (SN): Used for absences which will start already within the following 2 weeks.
